website_summaries.verdict: A double-ended lip gloss and creamy lipstick that comes in a wide range of on-trend shades and is paired with a plumping action.
pros: Initial minty tingle that brings some plumping results
The color is long-lasting throughout the day
Layer the gloss over the lipstick for the best color payoff
Some shades work well as a highlighter gloss over other lip products
cons: Some complaints that the shades are not accurate to online swatches

customer_reviews.title: Color is off, but has an okay effect
customer_reviews.text: The color is not accurate to the photos, or the color on the cap, at all. It's more of a plum than a dark nude, which is fine. The plumping effect is also extremely subtle, and much stronger from the crayon side than the gloss side.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Can't say it plumped my lips any. I did notice when I used one end of the Lipstick my lips kind of stung just a bit but did they plump up.. NOPE
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: This lipstick is a must-have!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lipsticks, I bought them in three colors--red, hot pink and mauve. The colors are bright and long lasting. I wear the lip liner alone and with the gloss on top. It looks good both ways!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this lip plumper. I should have did some research before I purchased this product. HA HA --My lips tingled for hours. I figured out that it is supposed to do that. However it is something I really did not enjoy or need. I ended up giving this lip plumper to my daughter in law. She is in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: RoniVic

customer_reviews.title: Nice Plump
customer_reviews.text: I think the color is Runway Ready? The bright purple one. It has a very comfortable and effective minty plump. Pros: Minty Plump Nice Color Has Liner & Gloss I loved it, will be buying in more colors
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Loving this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, long wearing lipstick. It is easy to apply and touch-up. And it gives your lips that plumping, tingling feeling I have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Kim garrity

customer_reviews.title: Color is ugly orange instead of nude!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this color which wasn’t true dark nude, it turns ugly orangey color... and didn’t plump any either. Big letdown!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This does plump my lips a little and stays on for a pretty long time so that's a win for me. It smells minty which I love & actually doesn't tingle too much unlike other brands I've tried. I ordered it in hot & spicy which is a very nice color as well. I'm pretty happy with my purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Color is completely different
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the color, not at all like the color it’s supposed to be. It’s a bright pink.
customer_reviews.author: Vieja Inés

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This lip product is very long lasting and not drying. Can’t find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Stays on ok. Did not plump that I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: Penny J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, lip feel great
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick and gloss in one I enjoy the coolness it gives my lips and feel .
customer_reviews.author: Vid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gem
customer_reviews.text: "For Real"! Highly recommend trying this, fun, sexy, and most of all nourishing plumpness to give you a full lips!!! Love this stuff especially a go to!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this for the price dosen't stay on long as long as others but its half the price
customer_reviews.author: ANGELIQUE KHAN

customer_reviews.title: Great color, nice staying power
customer_reviews.text: My go to lipstick. The tingling when you apply breaks up the boredom of everyday life
customer_reviews.author: BeckyN

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the product
customer_reviews.text: It is not a very attractive color on me very tacky looking
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Yucky lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Not the right color I ordered Very very sticky lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Best lipstick I have ever used! Stays on all day. I have purchased many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Heath

customer_reviews.title: Purple crush
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and look felt great lip plumper works instant
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: It works, just like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: It keeps your smile plumper- not like some lipsticks that can make your lips shrink as it drys up- nice colors too!
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS RED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Marvelous lipstick - great look - just don't get it on your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - very rich looking and plenty of tingle. Works!
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light nude
customer_reviews.text: Love this by itself or to lighten up a darker shade. It really does plump the lips!
customer_reviews.author: sarah m orozco

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lip applicator and color, moisturizing look, but plumping really isn't it's affect....
customer_reviews.text: Rounded top of color applicator, color is perfect and love how it looks and feels, but do not get lip plumping, still will buy for the moisture look !
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful on my lips.. I’m going to stock up on this..
customer_reviews.author: Kay W

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent-icky pink; Falsified plumping effect
customer_reviews.text: Trivial, yet exaggerated plumping of this product. Received the wrong color. Definitely not plum, but a icky pink color.
customer_reviews.author: SharePoint Pro

customer_reviews.title: Tingly
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to plump my lips, but I don't think the way it makes my lips feel. Its a mix between a tingle and a sunburn. Also, it's more of a gloss, not lipstick. It comes off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: MzSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Better then more expensive plumpers
customer_reviews.text: Slight change that was better then previously used expensive plumper. The color is nice and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The liner is thick and nice and filler fills in nice. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and the way this goes on.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bub

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love these lipsticks and its all i buy now
customer_reviews.author: Karra Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I can feel it tingling as soon as I put it on, so I assume it works. Wl definitely purchase this many times over.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Lip Studio Plumper, Please! Lipstick Makeup, 1 Count, Close-Up
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count| Color:Close-UpForget about fillers! Maybelline's Lip Studio Plumper, Please! delivers the look of full lips. This 2-in-1 must-have features stimulating plumping technology, a nourishing glossy formula, and a doe foot applicator to deliver your most amplified looking lips yet. Packaging May Vary
feature_bullets: From the runway to Instagram, get the look of big and full lips with Maybelline's Lip Studio Plumper, Please
Enhance the natural contour of your lips with this pout perfecting plumping lip liner and lip color duo
Infused with plumping ingredients in both an irresistibly glossy lip color formula and a creamy lip color stick, this 2-in-1 essential is all you need for the look of big lips
The stimulating plumping technology works to create a tingling sensation that makes lips appear fuller and more plump
Maybelline New York's Lip Studio Plumper, Please is available in a range of bold shades from nudes to plums

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
